description: Stuffed with a delicious cream-cheese filling, these roasted mushrooms are perfect as both a starter or main, and they're vegetarian meaning no-one misses out!
keywords: Stuffed vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Video,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Cream Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Grease a large baking tray.

Remove stems from mushrooms and set aside. Place mushrooms, stem-sides up, on tray. Finely dice stems. Heat butter in a large frying pan over medium-low heat. Add stems and garlic, then cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until mushrooms soften. Add breadcrumbs and cook for a further 2 minutes or until breadcrumbs start to brown lightly.
Transfer breadcrumb mixture into a large bowl. Add cream cheese, parsley and 1/3 cup mozzarella and mix until well combined. Season.

Divide breadcrumb mixture among mushroom cups, pressing gently to compact. Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella, then bake for 15 minutes or until golden and mushrooms are tender. Sprinkle with extra parsley and serve.
